alert.note: Alert for City of Bristol; Russell; Washington (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 27 at 9:28PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, City of Bristol, Russell and Washington. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 927 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Up to 2.5 inches of rain have fallen and it will take some time for water to drain away. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bristol Va, Lebanon, Holston, Hansonville, Lindell, Rosedale, Benhams and Collingwood. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
